sentences.en: This practice is frowned upon as being wasteful.
sentences.cn: 这种做法被认为是浪费而不被赞成。

sentences.en: By investing in efficient plant it could generate lots of valuable carbon credits to sell to wealthier, more wasteful nations.
sentences.cn: 投资高效工厂能节余很多宝贵的碳信用额度，可以用来卖给那些更富有、更浪费的国家。

sentences.en: As consumers, we are very wasteful.
sentences.cn: 作为消费者，我们非常浪费。
